001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa;
002
003import com.google.common.eventbus.Subscribe;
004import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
005import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
006import org.mockito.ArgumentCaptor;
007
008import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa.EmailCredentialsView.EmailAddressValueListener;
009import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa.EmailCredentialsView.PasswordValueListener;
010import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa.EmailCredentialsView.SubmitCredentialsListener;
011import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
012import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
013import static org.mockito.Mockito.*;
014
015public class EmailCredentialsPresenterTest extends EventBusTestCase {
016
017  private EmailCredentialsView view;
018  private EmailCredentialsPresenter presenter;
019
020  @Override
021  @BeforeEach
022  public void setUp() {
023    super.setUp();
024
025    this.view = mock(EmailCredentialsView.class);
026
027    presenter = new EmailCredentialsPresenter(bus, view);
028  }
029
030  @Test
031  public void downloadingSubmissionsDisplaysEmailCredentialsView() {
032    this.bus.post(new DownloadPOASubmissionsRequest());
033
034    verify(this.view).setIsVisible(true);
035  }
036
037  @Test
038  public void downloadingSubmissionsDisplaysStatusMessage() {
039    StatusMessageListener listener = mock(StatusMessageListener.class);
040    this.bus.register(listener);
041
042    this.bus.post(new DownloadPOASubmissionsRequest());
043
044    ArgumentCaptor<StatusMessage> captor = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(StatusMessage.class);
045    verify(listener).handleStatusMessage(captor.capture());
046
047    StatusMessage status = captor.getValue();
048    assertThat(status.getStatusMessage(), equalTo(EmailCredentialsPresenter.ENTER_CREDENTIALS_MESSAGE));
049  }
050
051  @Test
052  void downloadingSubmissionsWithNoCredentialsDoesNotPopulateView() {
053    this.bus.post(new DownloadPOASubmissionsRequest());
054
055    verify(this.view, never()).setEmailAddress(any(String.class));
056    verify(this.view, never()).setPassword(any(String.class));
057  }
058
059  @Test
060  void downloadingSubmissionsWithCredentialsPopulatesView() {
061    String email = "me@me.com";
062    String password = "password";
063    this.bus.post(new DownloadPOASubmissionsRequest(email, password));
064
065    verify(this.view).setEmailAddress(eq(email));
066    verify(this.view).setPassword(eq(password));
067  }
068
069  @Test
070  public void emailAddressInViewIsSavedToPresenter() {
071    ArgumentCaptor<EmailAddressValueListener> emailAddress = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(EmailAddressValueListener.class);
072    verify(this.view).addEmailAddressValueListener(emailAddress.capture());
073
074    String address = "me@email.com";
075    emailAddress.getValue().setEmailAddress(address);
076
077    assertThat(presenter.getEmailAddress(), equalTo(address));
078  }
079
080  @Test
081  public void passwordInViewIsSavedToPresenter() {
082    ArgumentCaptor<PasswordValueListener> passwordCaptor = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(PasswordValueListener.class);
083    verify(this.view).addPasswordValueListener(passwordCaptor.capture());
084
085    String password = "password";
086    passwordCaptor.getValue().setPassword(password);
087
088    assertThat(presenter.getPassword(), equalTo(password));
089  }
090
091  @Test
092  public void enteringCredentialsInViewFiresEmailCredentialsEvent() {
093    ArgumentCaptor<SubmitCredentialsListener> submitListener = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(SubmitCredentialsListener.class);
094    verify(this.view).addSubmitCredentialsListener(submitListener.capture());
095
096    EmailCredentialsListener listener = mock(EmailCredentialsListener.class);
097    this.bus.register(listener);
098
099    String emailAddress = "me@email.com";
100    this.presenter.setEmailAddress(emailAddress);
101    String password = "password";
102    this.presenter.setPassword(password);
103
104    submitListener.getValue().submitCredentials();
105
106    ArgumentCaptor<EmailCredentials> credentials = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(EmailCredentials.class);
107    verify(listener).emailCredentials(credentials.capture());
108
109    assertThat(credentials.getValue().getEmailAddress(), equalTo(emailAddress));
110    assertThat(credentials.getValue().getPassword(), equalTo(password));
111  }
112
113  public interface EmailCredentialsListener {
114    @Subscribe
115    void emailCredentials(EmailCredentials event);
116  }
117
118  private interface StatusMessageListener {
119    @Subscribe
120    void handleStatusMessage(StatusMessage status);
121  }
122}
